txt_en: The only real failure is the failure to try and the measure of success is how we cope with disappointment.
txt_cn: 唯一真正的失败是放弃尝试；衡量成功的标准是我们如何面对失望。
author: 《涉外大饭店》

txt_en: The time spent with you allowed me to feel again.
txt_cn: 与你共度的时光，让我重新苏醒。
author: 《大洋之间的灯光》

txt_en: If you want the best the world has to offer, offer the world your best.
txt_cn: 若想得到世界上最好的东西，先向世界展现最好的你。
author: Neale Donald Walsch

txt_en: I like to feel his eyes on me when I look away.
txt_cn: 我喜欢当我看向别处时他的目光停留在我身上的感觉。
author: 《爱在黎明破晓前》

txt_en: You never know how far you can go unless you run.
txt_cn: 你如果不跑起来，就永远不知道自己能走多远。
author: 《一代骄马》

txt_en: A clear vision, backed by definite plans, gives you a tremendous feeling of confidence and personal power.
txt_cn: 一个清晰的愿景，加以明确计划的支持，会给你极大的信心和个人力量。
author: Brian Tracy
